Summarise tracer contributions / suggest authorship for set of neurons

summarise_contribution produces a data.frame of contributions by user. suggest_authorship can use this to suggest which contributors meet defined authorship/acknowledgement criteria. suggest_authorship suggests how to acknowledge individuals write_authors produces a list of authors write_ack produces an acknowledgements wording.

summarise_contribution(skids, type = c("nodes", "synapses", "pre", "post"),
  ...)

suggest_authorship(x, auth = 5, ackn = c(3000, 100))

write_authors(x, ...)

write_ack(x, ...)

Arguments

skids

catmaid skeleton ids (see catmaid_skids)
type

Whether to summarise contributinons towards arbour (nodes) or synapses
...

Additional arguments passed by summarise_contribution to catmaid_get_contributor_stats or by write_authors/write_ack to suggest_authorship
x

A data frame containing the output of summarise_contribution
auth

The minimum percentage of the total effort for authorship
ackn

The minimum number of nodes/synapses to be acknowledged. When length of 2, the first number is assumed to be the criterion for arbour nodes, the second for synapses.

Value

A data.frame describing contributions or for write_authors/write_ack a string describing in descending order of contribution written to the console by cat.

Examples

pnsc=summarise_contribution("annotation:^PN$")
suggest_authorship(pnsc)
#>     id      n              full_name        pct     cpct action
#> 1   12 110309          Jacob Ratliff 13.5606368 13.56064   auth
#> 2  117  98851         Ruairi Roberts 12.1520684 25.71271   auth
#> 3   11  80580        bailey harrison  9.9059561 35.61866   auth

#> 5   13  63159           Addy Adesina  7.7643371 52.39683   auth
#> 6   54  43030        Ben Koppenhaver  5.2898150 57.68664   auth
#> 7   25  41755          Lucia Kmecova  5.1330752 62.81972   auth
#> 8   53  39794      Najla Masoodpanah  4.8920032 67.71172    ack

write_authors(pnsc, auth=3.0)
#> Jacob Ratliff, Ruairi Roberts, bailey harrison, Jawaid Ali, Addy Adesina, Ben Koppenhaver, Lucia Kmecova, Najla Masoodpanah, Corey Fisher, Benjamin Gorko, Adam John
write_ack(pnsc)
#> We thank Najla Masoodpanah, Corey Fisher, Benjamin Gorko, Adam John, Michael Lingelbach, Shahrozia Imtiaz, Nadiya Sharifi, Alex Bates, Philipp Ranft, Philipp Schlegel, Greg Jefferis, Sri Murthy, Mahmoud Elbahnasawi, Ala Haddad, Amelia Edmondson-Stait, Clement Hallou, Bindu Gampah, Fiona Love, Steven Calle, Davi Bock for contributing 34.9 % of reconstructed arbour cable.

pnsc=summarise_contribution("annotation:^PN$", type='synapses')
